title: register student api validation
description: Test the /api/auth/register endpoint to ensure student registration succeeds with valid data and returns 201 status, and returns 400 status on validation errors.

title: user login and jwt issuance
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to verify user authentication with valid credentials returns 200 and JWT token, and invalid credentials return 401.

title: fetch authenticated user profile
description: Test the /api/auth/profile endpoint to ensure it returns the authenticated user's profile data with 200 status and returns 401 if unauthorized.

title: verify jwt token validity
description: Test the /api/auth/verify endpoint to confirm it returns 200 for valid JWT tokens and 401 for invalid or expired tokens.

title: student profile creation and listing
description: Test the /api/students POST endpoint for creating student profiles with proper authorization and validation, and GET endpoint for listing students with role-based access returning 200.

title: student profile update and deletion
description: Test the /api/students/{id} PUT endpoint to update student profiles and DELETE endpoint to remove students by admin, verifying correct status codes and authorization enforcement.

title: secure resume upload and streaming
description: Test the /api/resume POST endpoint for secure resume upload by authenticated users returning 201, and /api/resumes/{studentId} GET endpoint for streaming PDF resumes with access control returning 200 or 403.

title: internship creation and filtering
description: Test the /api/internships POST endpoint for creating internships by authorized admin/recruiter users returning 201, and GET endpoint for listing internships with query filters returning 200.

title: application submission and status update
description: Test the /api/applications POST endpoint for submitting internship applications with validation returning 201 or 400, and PUT endpoint /api/applications/{id}/status for updating application status with authorization returning 200 or 403.

title: notification scheduling and cancellation
description: Test the /api/notifications POST endpoint for scheduling notifications returning 201, GET endpoint for listing scheduled notifications returning 200, and POST /api/notifications/{id}/cancel for cancelling notifications returning 200 or 404.
